name: Vacances aux Sea Shell
description:
Made for Minijam 108 - Seaside with azgoum.itchi.io
Vote for us here https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-108-seaside

As a hermit crab, seashells offer you a house and protection ... for a time.

Run through the beach and find seashells to protect yourself from the lurking sharks and shooting urchins ... Oh, and in case of emergency just shoot your LAZER at them !

Controls:
MOUSE CLICK for your lazer!
AZERTY : Z/S move up/down, Q defense, D dash
QWERTY:W/S move up/down, A defense, D dash
ARROWS : UP/DOWN move up/down, LEFT defense, RIGHT dash
